content:
Hung-Chi Hi, I’m Hung-Chi! Originally from Taiwan, I’ve recently relocated to Toronto and am eager to start my professional journey here in Canada. With over three years of experience as a back-end developer specializing in Java, I’ve developed extensive expertise in building and optimizing APIs, managing databases, and integrating third-party services.
I’m currently seeking opportunities to contribute my skills, collaborate with passionate teams, and continue growing as a developer. If you’re looking for a dedicated and experienced Java engineer, I’d love to connect!
Feel free to reach outâ€”let’s chat about how I can add value to your team.
TECHNOLOGIES AND TOOLS Category Technologies Languages Java Frameworks Spring Boot, MyBatis API Development RESTful API, OpenAPI Databases MySQL, Redis Messaging & Streaming Kafka Containerization & Orchestration Docker, Kubernetes CI/CD Jenkins, GitLab Logging & Monitoring ELK Stack, Prometheus, Grafana Project Management Jira Documentation Confluence
summary:
Hung-Chi

Hi, I’m Hung-Chi! Originally from Taiwan, I’ve recently relocated to Toronto and am eager to start my professional journey here in Canada. With over three years of experience as a back-end developer specializing in Java, I’ve developed extensive expertise in building and optimizing APIs, managing databases, and integrating third-party services.

I’m currently seeking opportunities to contribute my skills, collaborate with passionate teams, and continue growing as a developer. If you’re looking for a dedicated and experienced Java engineer, I’d love to connect!
title: About Me
